{"notifications":[{"id":7370,"message":"In response to the Governor’s directive, Sunnybrook School District will be closed starting Monday, March 16, 2020 until the end of the school year May 29, 2020. The District is using our Remote Learning Plan at this time.","type":"banner"},{"id":8058,"message":"Just an FYI that we will begin distributing food again starting Monday April 20, 2020. Food Distribution will again be as follows:

Mondays 10:30-12:30 distribute 2 days of breakfast and lunch, 
Wednesdays 10:30-12:30 distribute 1 day of breakfast and lunch,
Thursdays 10:30-12:30 distribute 2 days of breakfast and lunch.","type":"overlay"}]}

div.div:
Mission Statement
Maximize student achievement by cultivating: critical thinking skills, innovative instructional practices and a collaborative school, home, and community partnership.
1. The self-worth of each child is nurtured within a diverse and inclusive environment
2. Students are engaged in a rigorous, culturally relevant and innovative learning experience
3. Educators apply result-driven instructional practices
4. Teachers and staff are engaged in continuous professional development
5. Parents, students, staff and community collaborate

p.span: Sunnybrook School District provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click ‘read more’ to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. You’ll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
